articles.author: Science Desk
articles.title: Mars Express looks at mysterious Martian moon after software update - The Indian Express
articles.description: The European Space Agency's Mars Express was launched more than 19 years ago. The MARSIS instrument aboard the spacecraft was designed to study Mars but a recent software update meant that it was able to take observations of Phobos, the larger of Mars's two m…
articles.content: After nearly twenty years of operation, the European Space Agencys (ESA) Mars Express spacecraft has received a software update that allows it to look at the mysterious Martian moon Phobos at much gr… [+3454 chars]
